TopicTitle: J-X4 Whiplash Engine Thrust indicator non functional

Articles.Content:
Hello,

System Info per Rules: Version is KSP2 0.1.1.0.21572 (vanilla), I am on Windows 10 using a RTX 2080 and Ryzen 9 5900X.

The Bug is as Follows: Using a J-X4 Whiplash Engine, I have encountered these  Issues:

  • While the Engine is producing thrust (Plane is accelerating down the Runway) The Display in the parts manager shows a thrust of 0.00kN.
  • After Flaming out due to high Altitude, The Engine instead is said to be operating at 7.38kN, while not producing any thrust (as expected).
  • Finally after falling back down into the lower atmosphere the Engine does not re-light and yet again is saidd to be at 0.00kN (although it now is indeed not producing thrust

To illustrate this, I have recorded my test flight. Link to it:
